General.Name: Touchstone International Medical Science Co Ltd
General.Description: Touchstone International Medical Science Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells medical devices in China, the United States, Europe, Japan, Russia, Brazil, Canada, Australia, and internationally. The company's products portfolio comprises intraluminal staplers, endoscopic linear cutters and reloads, linear cutters and reloads, auto purse string clamps, and linear staplers and reloads, as well as proctological, circumcision, and circular staplers. It offers its products for use in laparoscopic and open surgeries. Touchstone International Medical Science Co., Ltd.was founded in 2003 and is based in Suzhou, the People's Republic of China.
